entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Ice fog patches this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
